rule: Descriptions can be written in any language and may contain grammatical errors or inappropriate vocabulary.
input: Un hombre corriendo en el parque con zapatos nuevos.
output: A young man, energized by his new running shoes, bursts through a vibrant autumn park. Sunlight streams through golden leaves, casting long shadows across a path dappled with fallen foliage. His athletic form cuts a sharp silhouette against the backdrop of towering trees, his expression resolute with purpose. Capture the exhilarating feeling of freedom and accomplishment as he gains speed towards the horizon.
